title: Unakenna Venum Sollu English Meaning Lyrics Yennai Arindhaal Song Lyrics

English Meaning
Yennai Arindhaal Song Lyrics
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Unakenna venum sollu
Ulagaththai kaatta sollu
Pudhu idam pudhu megam
Thaedi povomey.

Pidiththadhai vaanga sollu
Veruppadhai neenga sollu
Pudhu vellam pudhu aaru
Neendhi paarpomey.

Iruvarin pagal iravu
Oru veyil oru nilavu.
Therindhadhu theriyadhadhu
Paarkkaporomey.

Ulagennum paramapadham
Vilundha pin uyarvu varum
Ninaiththadhu ninaiyaadhadhu
Serkkaporomey.

Oru velli kolusu pola
Indha boomi sinungum keela.
Aniyaadha vairam pola
Andha vaanam minungum Mela.(2)

Kanavugal theerndhaal indru
Kalangida koodaadhindru
Dhinam dhinam ninaivu vandhu
Thoonga solliyadhe.

Enakkena unnai thandhu
Unakkiru kannai thandhu
Adhan vazhi enadhu kanaa
Kaana solliyadhey.

Nee adam pidiththaalum
Adangi pogindren.
Unmadi meththai Mel
Madangi kolgindren.

Unakenna venum sollu

Ilandha en inimaigalai

Ezhdhidum un viralil

Kandu kondeney.

Thuruvangal pol neelum
Idaiveli andru ohhh.
Thozhgalil un moochu
Ilaigiradhindru.

I tried my best :)
tell what you want
ask to see this world
we will go to see
new place and new world

buy what you like
ignore what you hate
its new flood and new river
lets swim and see.

our day and night
its one sun and one moon.
we gonna see
what we know and don’t.

world is full of ladders
will rise on every failure.
we gonna gather
what we thought and don’t.

like a silver anklet
this earth is murmuring below.
like a unworn diamond
this sky is glittering on top.

even if dreams are over
to feel not bad.
thoughts came daily
to make me sleep.

in your eyes.

even if you’re stubborn
i go contained.

your lap.

i could see my
lost happiness in you.

on your fingers
on your laughing lips
i could see my lost
poesy

between us before.
now I could feel
your breath in my shoulder.
